semantics.label: Pateikimas
semantics.description: Pasirinkite, kokiu režimu norite, kad laikmatis veiktų.

options.label: Skaičiuokite atgal nuo tam tikro laiko

fields.label: Baigta žinutė
fields.description: Optional message to display when the date and time that were set have been reached.
fields.default: The target time has been reached.

fields.label: Too late message
fields.description: Optional message to display when the timer is opened after the target date and time.

semantics.label: Select number to count down from

fields.label: Start time
fields.description: Set start time in the format H:MM:SS.

fields.label: Finished message
fields.description: Optional message to display when the timer has finished.

fields.label: Pradėti automatiškai
fields.description: If checked, the timer will start automatically. If not checked, the user will have to start the timer.

fields.label: Pauseable
fields.description: If checked, the user will be able to pause the timer.

fields.label: Resettable
fields.description: If checked, the user will be able to reset the timer.

semantics.label: Time format
semantics.description: Pasirinkite, kokį laiko formatą turi turėti laikmatis.

semantics.label: Granuliuotumas
semantics.description: Pasirinkite mažiausią vienetą, kuris bus rodomas išsamiu režimu. Jei per likusį laiką to vieneto vertė yra 0, automatiškai bus pasirinktas kitas mažesnis vienetas.

semantics.label: Laikmačio signalas
semantics.description: Optionally set an audio file that should be played when the timer has expired. Please note that when starting the timer automatically, the browser may prevent playing the signal unless the user has interacted with the page first.

fields.label: Dienų vienetas
fields.description: Dienų vieneto tekstas išsamiu laiko formatu.

fields.label: Valandų vienetas
fields.description: Vieneto tekstas valandoms išsamiu laiko formatu.

fields.label: Minučių vienetas
fields.description: Vieneto tekstas minutėms išsamiu laiko formatu.

fields.label: Vienetas sekundėms
fields.description: Vieneto tekstas sekundėms išsamiu laiko formatu.

fields.description: Header for lap column in lap tracking table.

fields.label: Header: Lap time
fields.description: Header for lap time column in lap tracking table.
